[[File:Jet Pack key art.jpeg|thumb|Key art]]

'''A Minecraft Movie: JetPack Add-on''' is an official [[add-on]] made in promotion of {{AMCM}}, which can be obtained by purchasing tickets to see the movie on its opening weekend (April 3 - April 7, 2025) through ''{{Wikipedia|Fandango Media|Fandango}}'' and select movie theater chains internationally.<ref name="fanoffer"/> Redemption codes must be redeemed before December 31, 2025 at 11:59pm PT.

== Additions ==
* {{MovieSprite|Jetpack}} [[File:Jetpack Render AMCM.png|40px]] JetPack 
** The jetpack is automatically given upon entering a world.
** Crafted from 7 [[Iron Ingot|iron ingots]], 1 [[Block of Redstone|block of redstone]], and 1 [[Gunpowder|gunpowder]].
** Has a battery life of 8 bars. It consumes 1 bar of battery every 2 seconds. When not in use, it automatically recharges every 0.5 tick. If the battery runs out while in use the jetpack will emit smoke and slowly descends the player back to the ground.
** Provides an infinite amount of [[Slow Falling|slow falling]].
